name: The Harvest Moon
description:
The Harvest Moon Context

This was made for the AAU Jam Fall 2020 Game Jam, where the Main Theme was "Harvest", with the wild card "10".

Story

You are a simple farmer getting ready for the harvest festival. However, it is cycle of The Harvest Moon, which awakens terrible creatures from the forest who will try and steal your harvest. Protect your farm from the pesky monsters and reap the profits of your harvest!

Controls

WASD/Arrow Keys to Move

Spacebar / Left Mouse button to Attack

1/2/3 to Switch weapons

Credit Tilemap (colours altered and edge tile added):
